text: @Mike_Pence Pro life for a fetus, no sanctity of life after birth. If it's black, have the police kill it. If it's public school age, let people carry military styled long guns to kill it. If it's elderly or immuno-compromised, let Covid-19 kill it. But you're more worried about cell cluster
